label: AB3_tI32_88_c_df-001
title: Copper (I) Azide (CuN$_{3}$) Structure
comments:
Not to be confused with \href{current_web_home_dir/AB6_oP28_62_c_6c-001}{Copper (II) Azide, Cu(N$_{3}$)$_{2}$, an explosive}. 
 (Wilsdorf, 1948) gave the Wyckoff positions in setting 1 of space group $P4_{1}/a$ \#88.  We used findsym to translate this to the standard setting 2.
